settings.title: Settings
privacyPoints: Data is stored in a secure cloud database
AI analysis is only used to provide personalized suggestions
We do not share your data with third parties
You can export or delete all data at any time
settings.description: An app to help you track and improve your late sleep habits

landing.heroSubtitle: AI-powered sleep tracking that helps you discover patterns, build better habits, and finally get to bed on time.
landing.feature1Desc: Get personalized insights into why you stay up late, powered by advanced AI.
landing.feature2Desc: Build consistency with daily recording streaks and motivational milestones.
landing.feature3Desc: Discover hidden patterns in your sleep behavior across days and weeks.
landing.feature4Desc: Export your data anytime in CSV or JSON format. Your data, your control.
landing.step1Desc: Log your sleep time and reason each night in seconds.
landing.step2Desc: AI identifies your top reasons and suggests improvements.
landing.step3Desc: Track your progress and build healthier sleep habits over time.
landing.finalCTASubtitle: Join and start understanding your late-night habits tonight.
